webpage.title: Infomentum Test Questions
webpage.description: Infomentum helps businesses maximise the power of API integration, information and robotic process automation (RPA).
webpage.title_social: Infomentum | Integration, automation & information to empower innovation

landing.title: Welcome!
landing.subtitle: Thank you for joining us.
landing.content: We all know that mental wellness is equally important as physical well-being. Let's go through a couple a questions to find out how you have been doing recently.

image.alt: Welcome! Thank you for joining us.

output.areyouinterested: Are you interested in hearing from us in the future?

results.title: Well done!
results.content:
Based on your answers, below are a few tips that we think might be helpful to you.

  • Talking to someone you trust
  • Trying to manage your worries
  • Look after your physical health
  • Try breathing excercises
  • Keep a diary to help you recognise and avoid stressors
  • Celebrate the positives

results.title: Well done!
results.content: Based on your answers, we think you are doing pretty well. Carry on as you were!

results.title: Well done!
results.content: Based on your answers, we think you are a Wellness Champion! Let’s celebrate your success together.

final.title: See you!
final.content:
Thank you for your time. We hope to hear from you in the future. 

Take care!
